title: Crappens Live Boston VPR: The Return of White Kanye
description:
We’re live in Boston this week at The Sinclair, and we’re thrilled to have one of Vanderpump Rules’ finest episodes to cover. We had a blast. Love you Boston!
To hear our premium bonus episodes, become a premium subscriber at http://patreon.com/watchwhatcrappens
***Crappens Live is coming to NYC, Irvine, DC, Detroit and Houston! Find ticket links at watchwhatcrappens.com.

See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.

Our Patreon Extras: https://patreon.com/watchwhatcrappens
author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (Ben Mandelker & Ronnie Karam)
